identity.name: Vintage Skate Shop Admin
identity.tone: Industrial, Raw, Efficient, Nostalgic but Modern
principles: Data is beautiful: Use monospaced fonts for all inventory data.
Hard Edges: No soft rounded corners. 0px or 2px radius max.
High Contrast: Black borders on off-white backgrounds.
Tactile: Buttons should feel like physical switches (hard shadows).

scale.h3: text-xl font-bold uppercase border-b-2 border-black pb-2
scale.label: text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-muted-foreground

usage.primary: Main actions (New Draft, Publish), Active States
usage.border: All borders should be solid 1px or 2px black

buttons.default: bg-white text-black border-2 border-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] transition-all active:translate-y-[4px] active:shadow-none uppercase font-bold tracking-wider text-sm px-6 py-3 rounded-none
buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white border-2 border-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:bg-primary/90 hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] transition-all active:translate-y-[4px] active:shadow-none uppercase font-bold tracking-wider text-sm px-6 py-3 rounded-none
buttons.ghost: bg-transparent text-black hover:bg-black/5 uppercase font-bold tracking-wider text-sm px-4 py-2

inputs.default: bg-white border-2 border-black rounded-none focus:ring-0 focus:border-primary focus:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(217,78,53,1)] transition-all font-mono text-sm placeholder:text-gray-400

cards.default: bg-white border-2 border-black rounded-none shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] p-6

badges.default: border-2 border-black rounded-none px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-bold uppercase bg-white text-black

dashboard.rules: Use high density. Summary cards span 1 col. Main list spans 3 cols.

wizard.rules: Clear progress indicators. Each step is a distinct 'card' or 'sheet'.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with stroke-width={2} for a bold look.

general: Do not use rounded corners. This is a strict 'Brutalist/Industrial' aesthetic.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all data fields (SKU, Price, Specs).
All interactive elements must have a hover state that involves movement (translate) or sharp color change.
Avoid gradients. Use solid colors and hard borders.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
accessibility: Ensure text contrast is at least 4.5:1.
Focus states must be high contrast (e.g., thick black ring).
testing: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and cards.
